Uses of Class
laazotea.indi.server.INDIClient

  • Packages that use INDIClient 
    Package Description
    laazotea.indi.server
    Provides the classes necessary to create INDI Servers and a basic but functional Server.
    laazotea.indi.server.examples
    Some examples to test the INDI for Java Server library.

    • Uses of INDIClient in laazotea.indi.server

      Methods in laazotea.indi.server with parameters of type INDIClient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract void AbstractINDIServer.connectionWithClientBroken(INDIClient client)
      Used to notify extending Servers that a Client connection has been broken.
      protected void DefaultINDIServer.connectionWithClientBroken(INDIClient client)
      Does nothing.
      protected abstract void AbstractINDIServer.connectionWithClientEstablished(INDIClient client)
      Used to notify extending Servers that a Client connection has been established.
      protected void DefaultINDIServer.connectionWithClientEstablished(INDIClient client)
      Does nothing.
      protected abstract void AbstractINDIServer.notifyClientListenersEnableBLOB(INDIClient client, org.w3c.dom.Element xml)
      Notifies Devices of a enableBLOB message (if necessary).
      protected void DefaultINDIServer.notifyClientListenersEnableBLOB(INDIClient client, org.w3c.dom.Element xml)
      Does nothing since the enableBLOB message is not usually useful for Devices.
      protected abstract void AbstractINDIServer.notifyClientListenersNewXXXVector(INDIClient client, org.w3c.dom.Element xml)
      Notifies Devices of a newXXXVector message.
      protected void DefaultINDIServer.notifyClientListenersNewXXXVector(INDIClient client, org.w3c.dom.Element xml)
      Sends the newXXXVector message to the appropriate Devices.
      protected void AbstractINDIServer.removeClient(INDIClient client)
      Removes a Client from the List of clients.

    • Uses of INDIClient in laazotea.indi.server.examples

      Methods in laazotea.indi.server.examples with parameters of type INDIClient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void INDIBasicServer.connectionWithClientBroken(INDIClient client)
      Prints a message about the broken connection to the standard err.
      protected void INDIBasicServer.connectionWithClientEstablished(INDIClient client)
      Prints a message about the established connection to the standard err.
